																                    Acute Promyelocytic Leukemia
																                    Treatment of acute promyelocytic leukemia may include the following:         -  All-trans retinoic acid (ATRA) plus chemotherapy.    -  Arsenic trioxide therapy.    -  Central nervous system sanctuary therapy with intrathecal chemotherapy.
